description: An initial dashboard for prometheus metrics from https://github.com/uber/cadence

targets.target: fetch service:cadence-frontend deployment:$deployment name:{cadence_errors,cadence_requests} | transformNull 0 | sum name | scaleToSeconds 1 | aliasByTags name
fetch service:cadence-frontend deployment:$deployment name:cadence_errors_bad_request | transformNull 0 | sum | scaleToSeconds 1 | alias BadRequest
fetch service:cadence-frontend deployment:$deployment name:cadence_errors_service_busy | transformNull 0 | sum | scaleToSeconds 1 | alias ServiceBusy
fetch service:cadence-frontend deployment:$deployment name:cadence_errors_entity_not_exists | transformNull 0 | sum | scaleToSeconds 1 | alias EntityNotExist
fetch service:cadence-frontend deployment:$deployment name:cadence_errors_execution_already_started | transformNull 0 | sum | scaleToSeconds 1 | alias ExecutionAlreadyStarted
fetch service:cadence-frontend deployment:$deployment name:cadence_errors_domain_already_exists | transformNull 0 | sum | scaleToSeconds 1 | alias DomainAlreadyExists
fetch service:cadence-frontend deployment:$deployment name:cadence_errors_cancellation_already_requested | transformNull 0 | sum | scaleToSeconds 1 | alias CancellationAlreadyRequested
fetch service:cadence-frontend deployment:$deployment name:cadence_errors_context_timeout | transformNull 0 | sum | scaleToSeconds 1 | alias ContextTimeout
fetch service:cadence-frontend deployment:$deployment name:cadence_errors_limit_exceeded | transformNull 0 | sum | scaleToSeconds 1 | alias LimitExceeded
fetch service:cadence-frontend deployment:$deployment name:{cadence_client_errors,cadence_client_requests} | transformNull 0 | sum name | scaleToSeconds 1 | aliasByTags name
fetch service:cadence-frontend deployment:$deployment  name:cadence_client_latency timertype:$latency  | transformNull 0 | aliasByTags operation
fetch service:$service deployment:$deployment name:cadence_{errors_*,requests} operation:startworkflowexecution | transformNull 0 | sum name | scaleToSeconds 1 | aliasByTags name
fetch service:$service deployment:$deployment timertype:{lower,median,p99,upper} operation:startworkflowexecution | transformNull 0 |  summarize 1min avg | avg timertype | aliasByTags timertype
fetch service:$service deployment:$deployment name:cadence_{errors_*,requests} operation:pollforactivitytask | transformNull 0 | sum name | scaleToSeconds 1 | aliasByTags name

fetch service:cadence-frontend deployment:$deployment name:cadence_requests operation:pollforactivitytask | sum | summarize 1m sum | diff (fetch service:cadence-frontend deployment:$deployment operation:pollforactivitytask name:cadence_errors | sum | summarize 1m sum) | asPercent (fetch service:cadence-frontend deployment:$deployment name:cadence_requests operation:pollforactivitytask | sum | summarize 1m sum) | transformNull 100 | alias availability
fetch service:cadence-frontend deployment:$deployment name:persistence_{errors,requests}  | transformNull 0 | sum name | scaleToSeconds 1 | aliasByTags name

panels.title: Activities latency (rate by count & sum by activity)

title: Cadence Server
